statements: DELETE FROM components WHERE quantity < 10 AND component_name = 'Widget';
DELETE FROM chains WHERE length > 50 AND material = 'Steel';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE component_type = 'tires' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM pedals WHERE brand = 'Speedy' AND color = 'Red';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE component_id = (SELECT id FROM tires WHERE brand = 'Michelin' AND size = 18)
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE component_id = (SELECT id FROM pedals WHERE brand = 'Shimano' AND color = 'Black')
DELETE FROM frames WHERE frame_material = 'Carbon Fiber' AND frame_stock < 10;
